SKT_FIRST.name: Icicle Lance
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and increases the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000068_1_1]</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPさせる。

SKT_SECOND.name: Absolute Zero
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
Removes <color=#28d9ed>1</color> buff(s) from targets not inflicted with Frozen, then attacks all enemies.
Increases damage dealt to targets inflicted with Frozen.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Grants barrier to all allies (proportional to Attack)
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 味方にシールド付与\n(攻撃力が高いほどシールド量がUP)

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Inflicts Frozen on all enemies for 1 turn\nIncreases damage dealt to bosses
SKT_BURST_2.effect_kr: 적 전체 빙결 1턴\n보스에게 입히는 피해 증가
SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 敵全体に凍結を1ターンの間付与\nボスに与えるダメージUP

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nActivates all effects of Absolute Zero
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n앱솔루트 제로의 모든 효과 발동
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n【絶対零度】の効果をすべて発動

description:
Removes <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000068_2_2]</color> buff(s) from targets not inflicted with Frozen, then attacks all enemies.
Increases damage dealt to targets inflicted with Frozen.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
빙결이 없는 대상들의 강화 효과를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제 후 적 전체를 공격합니다.
이 스킬로 빙결 대상에게 입히는 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp:
凍結がない対象の強化効果を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除した後、敵全体にダメージを与える。
このスキルで凍結状態の対象に与えるダメージがUPする。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Diamond Dust
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Frozen</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color> and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Reduced Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nRight after using this skill, does not trigger an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response, and increases damage dealt to bosses.
description: Attacks all enemies.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000068_3_2]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Frozen</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000068_3_2] turn(s)</color> and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000068_3_3]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Reduced Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000068_3_3] turn(s)</color>.\nRight after using this skill, does not trigger an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response, and increases damage dealt to bosses.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다.\n공격 후 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>빙결</color>을 부여하고, <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>속도 감소</color>를 부여합니다.\n이 스킬 직후에는 적의 반격, 복수, 신속 대응이 발동하지 않고, 보스에게 입히는 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。\n攻撃後、敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>凍結</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与し、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。\nこのスキルでは敵の反撃、復讐、迅速対応が発動しない。また、ボスに与えるダメージがUPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Find Weakness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Find Weakness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000070_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000068_backup_1_1]</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>약점 공략</color>을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:攻撃後、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>弱点攻略</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>UPさせる。
